title: How to Make Banana Chocolate Bites

steps.headline: Cut the bananas into slices measuring about 3 centimeter (1.2 in).
Spread the chocolate sprinkles over wax paper on a flat surface.
Melt the chocolate chips/drops in a double boiler sitting over hot water or in the microwave
Remove from heat/microwave when the chocolate has melted.
steps.description: Add the oil and stir until smooth.

steps.headline: Skewer a banana slice.
steps.description: Dip the slice into the melted chocolate. Cover the slice.

steps.headline: Roll the chocolate covered slice in the sprinkles.
Place the slice onto wax paper.
steps.description: Leave to set at room temperature.

text: Preparing the Bananas Peel the bananas. Cut off each end. Cut the bananas into slices measuring about 3 centimeter (1.2 in).  Coating the Bananas Spread the chocolate sprinkles over wax paper on a flat surface.  Melt the chocolate chips/drops in a double boiler sitting over hot water or in the microwave  Remove from heat/microwave when the chocolate has melted. Add the oil and stir until smooth. Skewer a banana slice. Dip the slice into the melted chocolate. Cover the slice. Roll the chocolate covered slice in the sprinkles.  Place the slice onto wax paper. Leave to set at room temperature. Serve.
